website_summaries.verdict: This hemp-omega 3 and 6 mix comes in a large, affordable bottle, making it a solid choice for bargain hunters wanting to try hemp oil, or those who use it in large quantities.
pros: Completely gluten and cholesterol free, formulated with omega 3 and 6 for extra health benefits
Easy squirt bottle can add oil to sauces, smoothies and other recipes
cons: Contains minimal CBDs, if any, making it less than useful for pain
Some say rancid smell and strange taste puts them off

customer_reviews.title: For any and mostly all type of pain....even chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough of this product. I have fibromyalgia and arthritis on my neck. Constant pain is with. After extensive research and learning about hemp oil. I went ahead and bought this product. I wish I would bought this 5 years ago. As I have in horrible pain. I have only been using this for 5 days.....FIVE! and I am beside myself, with no pain. Just a little discomfort on my neck where the shoulder meet.
customer_reviews.author: gaby

customer_reviews.title: HEMP OIL
customer_reviews.text: I HAD CHRONIC PLANTAR FACEITAS FOR A VERY LONG TIME ABOUT 6 MONTHS, STERIOD SHOTS IN MY FOOT DID NOT WORK, MEDICINE DID NOT HELP AT ALL AND I DECIDED TO TRY HEMP OIL AND I AM ALMOST DONE WITH MY FIRST BOTTLE AND MY PROBLEM IS ABOUT 90 PERCENT RESOLVED AND I AM SURE IT WILL GO AWAY COMPLETELY WITH MORE HEMP OIL USE.
customer_reviews.author: VINNY BLUESMAN

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: And as soon as it arrived I rubbed some on my legs . .wow-- wish I had known about this earlier! I'm impressed. Don't know why but this year my skin has been extra dry but I've used everything this to combat dry skin and this works like a charm. I will be a repeat customer and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy55

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for acne!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Has improved my acne so much that my face is almost back to normal. I put tons on my face and let it steam in the shower for cleanser. Also can use it for moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: Erophili Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is amazing, I mixed it with Raspberry seed butter and used it for my husbands Psoriasis and it was really doing a good job. He's even getting remarks from people about how much better his skin is looking...YAY!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaV

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Rancid
customer_reviews.text: This tastes slightly rancid. Also, I have to say there are a lot of comments here about pain relief from this product. I think that represents a fundamental misunderstanding of what this is. This does NOT contain CBD (the pain reliever in hemp / cannabis). It is just oil that is rich in Omega-6 and 3 (like fish oil but better) which have long term restorative properties, but not short term pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Fortunate Son

customer_reviews.title: WHO would sell a product packaged in this way??
customer_reviews.text: This bottle of hemp oil that is supposed to be first rate came in a warped plastic jug that had been in the heat and was sucked in because it wasn't sealed. There was NO SEAL anywhere on the bottle. For all I know, someone could have opened it and spit into it. I don't think it is a safe product for me to use. I am throwing it away and looking for something better. Disgusting. Really disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn T.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 71 year old husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 71 year old husband and he immediately noticed a difference in how he felt after the first tablespoon. The biggest improvements have been with his joint pain and energy level. He takes 2 tablespoons a day and has told me to keep it stocked, he does not want to run out.
customer_reviews.author: K. K.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good if not just a smidge better that the Nutiva ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as good if not just a smidge better that the Nutiva Organic Hemp Oil, 24-Ounce Bottle. Except its 17 oz not 24 but it does have 8 grams of all the omega not 7 like the Nutiva Organic Hemp Oil, 24-Ounce Bottle. Great product !!
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: Very clever language
customer_reviews.text: When you go to their website they will subtly start indicating that this hemp oil is CBD oil. Not so. Do your homework and you'll find they are two different products from the same plant. All these "pain relieving" reviews must be psycho-somatic responses. Hemp oil has no effect on pain, but has other healthful properties. If you're looking for pain relief, at least try CBD oil--no guarantees, because we're all unique in how our bodies react. However, I am not happy with the subtle suggestion that this stuff is that same as CBD oil. False, or clever advertising? You be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied and am buying a second bottle today. Some people complained about the taste. It tastes like hemp hearts, only more so. I find this pleasant, but if you dislike hemp hearts, you'll probably dislike this more. I've tried swallowing it by itself. This is difficult, but I think because it is an oil (and swallowing pure oils is always weird for me) not because of the taste. It's nice on cereal, in smoothies, soups, stir fries, baking, etc, though. It's great on skin. I use it as part of sunscreen and lotion and am really happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: CHANGED MY LIFE !!!  NOT KIDDING !!
customer_reviews.text: CHANGED MY LIFE! I had severe, debilitating pain for months! Did my research and made this purchase! Took my first dose one evening and the next day zero pain. Took daily for a couple of months and now take weekly! I have since bought for a friend with arthritis and he loves it! Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann

customer_reviews.title: No Scent
customer_reviews.text: I was using Dr. Adorable hemp oil, which worked fine but had a slightly nutty scent to it. The scent didn't bother me but it was difficult to mask with my peppermint essential oil, so the two blend together and tbh nuts and mint don't quite go together. This has an even milder scent. I use this for my DIY body wash, with a mix of unscented castille soap, raw honey, and essential oils. Best soap I've ever used in my life for sensitive and acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sbullet

customer_reviews.title: Skin food :)
customer_reviews.text: I use this hemp oil to remove my makeup. I simply rub it into dry sky until the makeup starts breaking down, and then wash my face with a warm wash cloth. I usually either follow up with a gentle cleanser to get any remnant oil/makeup off, or a toner. Sometimes I use the hemp oil to moisturize my face (night time), or my body (after a shower). My skin LOVES this stuff, it doesn't break me out (like coconut oil did), and it has helped my eczema SO much.
customer_reviews.author: MGB

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I take two tablespoons a day and am mostly pain free.The pain will return if you run out. My husband took him self off 4 anti-depressants by taking this oil. He also took it for an ear infection 2 tsp 4 times a day. It was gone in two days. He has C.O.P.D. and has had bronchitis all fall and winter. Antibiotics work while he's on them then it comes back. He started taking the CBD oil and it's gone! He takes 2 tsp. twice a day. It's awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Best oil for acne
customer_reviews.text: Best oil for acne. Previously, I have tried coconut oil, olive oil, jojoba oil, nigella sativa oil, and almond oil. None of them helped my acne, and most of them broke me out. I wish I had known about hemp seed oil years ago.
customer_reviews.author: pinetreeheaven

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All good except for the plastic bottle. How about some glass to keep the organic hemp oil truly organic?
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Works 4 animals and humans
customer_reviews.text: So we have given this to one of the dogs because he has allergies and massive pain. This has helped him l. We put it in with some peanut butter hand that boy liked it. I have recently put this on my scalp because of Seborrheic Dermatitis <dandruff like> it has worked well. Made my hair super oily but it did the trick! I'm going to start taking this daily for my pain as well. My grandmother used it for her dry spots on her skin it works for her also Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucretia

customer_reviews.title: It seems to do what it says it will do ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do what it says it will do. So far it has calmed my restless legs and subdued the pain on my neck. That's a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This has really helped my pain, I have Fibromyalgia ...
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped my pain , I have Fibromyalgia and Arthritis. It helps me sleep too . I am ordering more today.
customer_reviews.author: Wguinn

customer_reviews.title: Canada Hemp
customer_reviews.text: The best natural ingredient to help me sleep, & relax me without side effects. Also good for your skin. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Messy but works
customer_reviews.text: Package was leaking upon arrival, seal was not broken but there was oil coming out. The bottle gets very oily and makes a mess where ever you sit it. I use it in my dogs food daily. She likes the taste and moves around better since starting this.
customer_reviews.author: Nyleve

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good quality. I like the pleasant taste too. The best part is the quantity you get and the value. If you want to try hemp oil for the health benefits and don't want to spend a lot of money for a tiny bottle that won't last long, give Canada Hemp Foods certified organic a try.
customer_reviews.author: COFFEEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Missing Lid
customer_reviews.text: This would have had 5 stars but the bottle arrived with NO LID, just the paper cover that you have to peel off prior to using. This oil needs to be refrigerated so I now have to cover the top with a small plastic bag. This should have been caught before it was placed in the box and shipped to me
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compared to other "organic" "Virgin" US-made products I previously bought
customer_reviews.text: This oil can be actually added to a fresh salad , unlike other "organic" "Virgin" US-made products that I tried before and had a terrible rotten taste and smell. Unfortunately, the lack of regulations for health supplements in the US makes it difficult to trust the content of the product.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using hemp oil, I use olive oil for cooking but now once the stuff is done I add one or more tablespoons of this for added nutrition. It is green and looks similar to Olive oil. They should sell larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: ET Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worthless...
customer_reviews.text: Another worthless hemp product. If it done half of what you guys say it does, I'd be your best customer. I've spent a lotta bucks, hoping that I'd find someone who could help me with the pain I've had for the last 50 years, but you guys aren't the answer.
customer_reviews.author: peterson

customer_reviews.title: Missing Safety Seal!!
customer_reviews.text: Oil arrived without a safety seal or safety cap. Initially requested replacement and replacement bottle also did not have safety seal. I do not feel safe ingesting this product. I have used oil on skin and hair and so far it works amazing. Please have someone in quality control assure the product has safety seal before shipping to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great all around product
customer_reviews.text: Great for face moisturizer, great for supplementing vitamins. Great value for the amount you receive. It’s great for hair as well! It helps hold down some loose strands but doesn’t make my hair oily. It’s great for restoring damaged hair!
customer_reviews.author: Awesome!

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: This product has the most vile and unpalatable taste. The smell is very putrid and off putting. I added to herbal teas, coffee and baked product to disguise the flavor. Wishful thinking and failed miserably. This has zero effect on those seeking relief from: anxiety, discomfort pain and sleep. You may as well suck a piece of ice and cell it a placebo.
customer_reviews.author: Kizza Drisana Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin - strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using it for a week. It’s been fantastic for make up removal. I rub it in my skin and massage and then cleanse with a cleanser. My skin is soft and clean. It has a very strong nutty smell. It’s pretty gross but I try to not breathe it in
customer_reviews.author: Emilly

customer_reviews.title: Great source of Omega 6/3
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for some hemp seed oil for my dogs raw diet and finally came across this brand. I liked the fact that for the price you get a good amount of oil. With other brands they would have less oil for more money. My dogs been doing really good with having this hemp oil and will definitely be subscribing to this. It's also a great source of Omega 6/3 and since hes been taking it his coat has started to look shinier and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and great for skin and scalp
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a fresh, nutty flavor when used with salads. It is also great for makeup removal and body and scalp massages. I can't attest to its ability to provide pain relief. I will have to provide an update at a later date for that.
customer_reviews.author: Erica L

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive the amount purchased :(
customer_reviews.text: Immediately upon opening my amazon box I thought that the bottle felt like it wasn't full enough so I weighed it and the entire bottle only weighed 16 ounces :( very disappointed since I ordered a 17 ounce and with the bottle and all it was only 16 oz.
customer_reviews.author: j. Petrunak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hemp oil
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality hemp oil. Taste is good and price, I was using for my immune system. I’m trying to be healthier now and this is great for salad dressing mix and even for skin. Can give to pets too. Help with their pain,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not sure if it works well
customer_reviews.text: This is 2nd time to buy it but still not sure if it works or not. I read the reviews before. Some people mentioned it helps for the sleeping problem but it did work for my father. They didn't say how long they took. So I gave another try.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have fibromyalgia and I'm going through menopause. I've noticed a huge difference in my pain level. My sleep patterns have also gotten a lot better. I gave some to my mom to try and with in 2 days she has noticed a huge relief in her arthritis in her hands. I will definitely order again. I was sceptical at First but I'm glad I ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Sh0rty_H

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the mildly nutty flavor with salads
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this brand of hemp seed oil for a bit over a year now and it's always been a pleasure. This brand is consistent in texture and flavor and I feel it is of higher quality than others. I really enjoy the mildly nutty flavor with salads. I chose hemp seed oil because it has all 20 amino acids - this includes the 9 essentials. It also has the perfect balance of 3:1 omega 6 & omega 3 fatty acids. Because hemp seed oil matches skin sebum, I also add it to lotions and lip balms.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this supplement to help me get off antidepressants. I chose not to listen to the Dr. and got off my antidepressants cold turkey, which I am not recommending. I look a spoonful twice a day and didn’t experience the brain shocks you get when you do not take the meds. For me this was a big deal because I had been wanting to get off the meds for years.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for myself & my skin is hydrated & soft. I got used to the smell.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil
customer_reviews.text: Packaged arrived on time and packaged well with no leaks or damage. The smell is not offensive and is very smooth on the skin. I've used it in mixtures for my skin and it blends very well with other carrier oils and essential oils. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This works for coming, but I prefer another brand for flavor & packaging. This one has an open screw top and I prefer the squeeze bottle flip top. It is not for pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Short

customer_reviews.title: Not good for eczema
customer_reviews.text: Made my eczema worst. I started taking it orally and applied it on my sever eczema and developed itchy hot rashes. I used it for a few days but read in the Eczema detox book that hump seed isn't good for eczema. I stopped using it. Looking for other treatments..
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Hajji

customer_reviews.title: Expires Too Close To Purchase Date
customer_reviews.text: The product is good and everything, but I’m disappointed I have to use all 17 ounces within 2 months. I use it as skincare so I’m going to have to give some away so it actually gets used up and not wasted. Not a fan that it’s going to be expiring so soon after purchase. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Berger

customer_reviews.title: Hemp Hemp Hoooray
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Great for cooking and moisturizing. My mom has MCD and this helps with her flair ups. She’s mentioned a decrease in inflammation
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Product expired?
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today 7 march 2019, the label says best used 2019 ma 01. Whats does it means? ma = march or ma = may. Either way it is expire or about to...
customer_reviews.author: Celida

customer_reviews.title: No seal.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived all dented and the cap had no seal. I don't know if it's safe to use or not. Is there supposed to be a seal on it that someone took off?
customer_reviews.author: zhhz

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love the nutty taste,not overpowering, give it to my dogs in their food as well for overall health. Even if it is not mixed in with food, they will lick the oil clean from their bowls. I actually enjoy this, which is rare for taking supplements.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeinSC

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: I never had that oil before, but due to joints pain, I decided to give it a try, but I couldn’t swallow it. It just felt very funny, but I guess that’s just me and there’s truly nothing wrong with it, the shipping was fast and packaging was spotless. I just should figure out a way to add it to food instead of chucking a teaspoon of the oil, my bad.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read that omega oils can help senior dogs with anxiety and thought maybe this might help my 12 year old Labrador. After about 2 months I have noticed improvement with his separation anxiety but most noticeably his coat looks so shiny.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like liquid grass
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like liquid grass. Awful actually. You must immediately follow up with something sweet. It leaves a heavy taste on your tongue. I can’t imagine using this oil again in your salad or other foods.

customer_reviews.title: Recomend
customer_reviews.text: 2 eye droppers at bed and I sleep like a log
customer_reviews.author: NOtracking#=1starRATING

I always have knee pains, I usually pour some on my knee and massage it with this oil and it helps me ease my joint pain. I did try to ingest it but it has a little bit of a weird taste.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep aid.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help me sleep which it seems to. Inoffensive taste like olive oil,green. No THC, so doesn't get you high. Refrigerate.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! I have noticed my skin is better!! I also like getting my Omega (3) from this! No fish oil!!

customer_reviews.title: We love our hemp oil
customer_reviews.text: We love our hemp oil! We take a spoon full at night and the morning and use it on our skin. Seems to be clearing our skin as well. Also good for inflammation which it might be helping too!

customer_reviews.title: just the way I like it. First bottle came damaged but seller immediately ...
customer_reviews.text: Tasty dark green hemp oil, just the way I like it. First bottle came damaged but seller immediately sent out a replacement which came within a couple of days. Good product, good seller, nothing more to say.

customer_reviews.title: Nastiest tasting **** i've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I think Id rather be in pain that to drink this nasty stuff. Horrible taste. I feed it to my DOG on her food.....she doesn't care for it either!

customer_reviews.title: Skin moisterizer
customer_reviews.text: As an ingredient in making hand cream, it works well. It acts as a penetrating agent to promote skin moisturizing.

customer_reviews.title: Realized I don’t like hemp oil.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good and all but the taste, ugh. I’m not a fan of it. I tried to like it since I’ve read about all of the benefits hemp oil provides but I just can’t do it. It takes like...I don’t know, what a couch might taste like. It’s just too overwhelming for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source of healthy fat
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery as always. I use this not only for health reasons but also to help with my skin. With just one use, the lines on my skin appear to have filled in....almost like Botox!!

I keep mine in the refrigerator as it will go rancid according to the bottle information. The hemp is suppose to be great for acne, I bought it because I have such dry skin, and this is wonderful!

I cannot use it internally due to its open state, but for skin moisturizing applications, it works very well.

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration date of product before your window of returns closes
customer_reviews.text: I just noticed that the "best by" date was 2 days after I received my purchase. I use this oil for my business, and am now unable to use it for products based on the shelf life of the oil I was sent. Not very happy about that.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the flavor which was slightly nutty and used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flavor which was slightly nutty and used it sparingly in salad dressings but I didn't use it long enough to notice a difference in health issues as it's pretty expensive. Probably should use it for at least a year to get a noticeable health benefit.

product_meta.title: Canada Hemp Foods- Certified Organic Hemp Oil-Super Omega 6-Super Omega 3-Non GMO-Gluten Free-THC Free-17 Fluid Ounces
product_meta.description: No other plant offers such a rich source of the essential fatty acids necessary for healthy human life. Canada One tablespoon (15 ml) of hemp seed oil contains over 90% Poly-unsaturated Fatty Acids (PUFAs) of which 80% of the oil is comprised of the Essential Fatty Acids (EFAs), omega-6 Linoleic Acid (LA) and omega-3 Alpha-Linoleic Acid (ALA). Suitable for all ages from children to seniors. This delicate oil, with a flavourful nutty taste, can be used in a wide range of recipes such as sauces, dips, spreads, marinades and salad dressings. It may also be added to protein shakes and smoothies.
feature_bullets: Canada Hemp Food’s Hemp Seed Oil is cold pressed and handcrafted in small batches and contains no THC.
Hemp oil provides 8 grams of Omega-6 and 2.5 grams of Omega-3. Providing a composition that elevates this oil far beyond basic nutrition.
Zero trans-fat, zero cholesterol, and 10% of the recommended daily intake for vitamin E
Vegan, gluten free, nut free, non-GMO, USDA and Pro-Cert Certified Organic.
